inclusion.criterion: Preoperative diagnosis of DCIS, of any grade and any size if planned for mastectomy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Planned Risk-reducing mastectomy, if it would be considered for upfront SLND due to institutional practice or in case of an individualised recommendation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Any case with a preoperative diagnosis of pre-invasive or unclear lesion, that upfront SLND would be otherwise considered, such as, but not limited to: Patients with a preoperative diagnosis of DCIS grade 3 any size or, DCIS grade 2 larger than or equal to 20 mm on mammography and planned for breast conserving surgery.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a preoperative diagnosis of DCIS on core biopsy with a palpable mass on clinical examination or mass effect on radiology or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a preoperative diagnosis of DCIS with suspicion of micro-invasion on core biopsy or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a mammographic/ultrasound/MRI finding, suspicious for breast cancer (BIRADS 4 or 5) planned for diagnostic excision with breast conserving surgery, with no definitive diagnosis of invasive cancer or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a preoperative diagnosis of DCIS, any grade, any size and planned for a complex oncoplastic procedure or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with a preoperative diagnosis of DCIS, any grade, any size and planned for a procedure that may compromise detection rate for a future SLND, such as, but not confined to: lesions in the upper outer quadrant or the axillary tail, removal of the nipple areola complex and so on or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The above mentioned categories with a preoperative diagnosis of pleomorphic Lobular Cancer in Situ (pLCIS), classic Lobular Neoplasia (LN) or Atypical Ductal Hyperplasia (ADH).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient is a 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The tumor is HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Intolerance/hypersensitivity to iron, dextran compounds or SPIO
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient deprived of liberty or under guardianship
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. She has no contraindications for the trial.
